description:
'''Jean-Christophe Le Saoût''' ({{IPA|fr|ʒɑ̃ kʁistɔf lə su|-|Jean-Christophe-Le-Saout-pron.ogg}}; born on 19 July 1975), better known by the stage name '''Wax Tailor''', is a French [[record producer]], DJ, and talent manager.
He has released six studio albums collaborating with other artists.
